column4: hrm. a user should be in the "users" group right? using users-admin, and it's not showing the "regular user" as part of users. it was also not part of admin, so we had to add that username to /etc/sudoers manually
what's the package manager called in ubuntu? a friend wants to know. where in menus can it be found?
synaptic is the standard one, but there are several (although they all use the apt back end)
